text: Howard Thomas Winter (March 17, 1929 â€“ November 12, 2020) was an American mobster. He was a leader of the Winter Hill Gang. He was born in Boston, Massachusetts. He was active from 1965 to 1979 when he went to jail for extortion. He was released in 1987. He was arrested again in 1993 after dealing cocaine. He was released in 2003. Winter died on November 12, 2020 in Millbury, Massachusetts from a heart attack, aged 91. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Boston Category:People convicted of drug offenses Category:American mobsters
title: Howie Winter
